name: House of Light
description: Imagine a property where you are embraced with natural lighting and is decorated with views of your natural vision. This 150 sqm modern property brings your garden indoors where you can admire the workings of your garden without stepping outside. It is a perfect balance of both industrial and natural features also featuring a pool for added tranquility. The calming earthy hues that are utilized in this home is the ultimate way of breaking away from the usual hustle and bustle of everyday city life.

name: Bruce Crescent
description: The Bruce Crescent project required conceptual rendering for a client in Westville. Working hand-in-hand with an interior decorator we have managed to showcase the exterior of this elegant family home. This home features clean lines, purpose-made aluminium louvres for added privacy and a matching custom gate. An attractive and spacious outdoors area will definitely be a focal point when it comes to wowing guests, featuring a patio area with a pool and a lush garden. This site is 2033 sqm in size, leaving more than enough space for the outbuilding and a mini soccer field.

name: Sunnyhill
description: With the perfect marriage of simplicity and luxury, this property boasts openness and lavish features. The house is designed to allow maximum natural light inside for added warmth and to bring out the best in any interior colour that is introduced. It features a spacious driveway, a lush garden and a pool with wooden panelling and lighting that adds that extra bit of special to the property. Day or night, this 617 sqm property is sure to offer pure comfort, entertainment and relaxation.
